website_summaries.verdict: This flour sifter has a unique design that allows you to sift and measure in one convenient unit.
pros: Sifter and measuring cup in one
Cup attaches for mess-free usage and comes apart for easy storage
Can be washed in the dishwasher
cons: Has plastic components that aren't as durable as sifters made of metal

customer_reviews.title: Please rethink buying these cups.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a year ago and loved the fact of having so many sizes and the pretty colors. After having them only a couple of weeks, the handle of one cup snapped off while scooping sugar. Now a year later only three cups have handles and those are the cups I use less often, The spoons, however have held up. I hate to write a bad review, but hate even more that others would waste their money buying these cups.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're just "snappin'"...!
customer_reviews.text: Do not like... I HAD loved the idea of this set, with its complete set of measurements and more, but the handles all started snapping off within the first two weeks, and I am not at all hard with utensils. I still have many of the same various purpose sets I was given for my marriage 34 years ago. These though, simply snap off at the cup, so that now, a year later? Are ALL cups only, without a handle in sight. VERY disappointed by same...
customer_reviews.author: Kimdy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have found that the handles break easily. The 1 cup measure handle happened with sugar. The 1/2 cup handle broke yesterday with flour. I don't use measuring cups all that often so it's not like they were worn out. They just snapped off. They are not very thick handles and there is no support. I have tupperware measuring cups from the 70's that are still in great shape. I hope that Progressive will take note to manufacture these properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They break
customer_reviews.text: These cups and spoons were awesome, until they weren’t. I was happy to have every measurement I could think of needing and for a good 2 years. Recently though they’ve started to break. The measurements handle is snapping right off of the cup and spoon. Plastic just doesn’t replace metal. I’ll spend my money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: H Petti

customer_reviews.title: measuring cups & spoons
customer_reviews.text: Be sure you have excellent eye sight......CANNOT read the measurements on cups nor spoons. They are useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.V Neff

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Finally. An easy sifter which provides a way to accurately measure the flour while I'm sifting it, and without either causing a mess on the counter or causing me to have tired hands. I spent several hours researching sifters before deciding on this one, and it paid off.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bitney

customer_reviews.title: Well made and work well.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these measuring cups, they save space in my drawer and are well made. The only thing I wish they had was darker markings on the handles showing what size they are. The markings are impressed into the handles but are very hard to read. I will just learn the color coding but it but be easier if I could see the markings on the handles. Over all though I am very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Bartsch

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I have four dogs that all require different food quantities -- I was always missing something out of my regular measuring cups that I use for baking/cooking. They usually didn't have every single increment either, so sometimes I had to use two different sizes to get the amount of dog food needed. Having these cups makes it simpler when my husband has to feed them if I'm gone too. simple is good :-) If I change feeding quantities (young dogs or gown dogs getting a bit chubby) I just change cups and then the correct ones are always there. Keep a set in the camper also!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W

customer_reviews.title: This is not dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January of 2019 and from the first found it almost impossible to read the measurements. But I figured I'd get used to it...never did. I used it only occasionally until yesterday after which my wife put it in the dishwasher. Afterward, I noticed a number of cracks on the side and bottom making it useless. My wife said that in the past she always washed it by hand and this was the first time she had placed it in the dishwasher. I'll need to buy another one now that is glass and not plastic. I learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Good Variety of Sizes
customer_reviews.text: I've been needing to get new measuring cups for a long time. My old ones have broken handles or the size has rubbed off. I didn't want to spend a lot but wanted a good set. Opening the box and seeing all of the sizes made me giggle ( I mean, I don't think I'm ever going to need a 1/32 teaspoon but you never know). They are lightweight plastic so I can't imagine they will be my lifetime set but I'm sure they will be fine. I think I will get a set for my son and daughter who are both moving on and setting up their own households. It's a great price for the variety you get.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comes with the ever hard to find 2/3 cup and 3/4 cup!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: The idea of these measuring cups is great, but the ring that is supposed to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: The idea of these measuring cups is great, but the ring that is supposed to hold them threaded together doesn’t clasps together all that well. Aside from that, it’s annoying to have to take the whole thing apart every time you need a new size so I wound up getting rid of it all together. These cups stay jumbled up in my drawer for the most part, but they serve their purpose. If I did this purchase over again, I would probably go with a different product, but if you’re looking for something that’s cost effective and still affords you a large selection of measurements, there’s nothing wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laci H.

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Measuring Set !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This truly is the ultimate measuring set. It has all the measurements one would possibly need in the kitchen. Very well made plastic. Easy to clean as it is dishwasher safe. Also the measurements are all engraved so they do not vanish with time. This is really a steal for the price !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We live in an RV where space is at a premium so the collapsible feature is great. The quality of this product is great so far. We have had it about a week and used it numerous times. The silicone is sturdy. I have purchased numerous items in this brand and all of them are of great quality. I am not suremthat overall these sqve too much room but they offer the option to store them in very shallow drawers where non-collapsible cups might not fit. Also, hanging these inside a cabinet door would be abgreat option that traditional measuring cups don't offer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this to try out for dog food. We needed to give our dog more and it was useful to go through the sizes until her weight was stable. But we've been using the 3/4 cup for a few months now, and the handle is breaking off. I don't regret purchasing these. They come in handy on Thanksgiving when I'm cooking 9 dishes for 12 people. Then they go back into the box until the next year.
customer_reviews.author: BostonFrankG

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors!
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and functional. They are not exactly "space-saving," as they do not nest when collapsed, and therefor end up being the same size, stacked, as a traditional set of measuring cups. That said, if you have a very shallow drawer for kitchen utensils, these are great; just don't stack them. They are also easy to pack; I take the 1/4 cup with us, as that's the how much kibble our dog eats at a time. All in all, we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Heatheranne

customer_reviews.title: Not a great set if you are a baker
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because there are so many different sizes and that there are 3 colors to differentiate the sizes somewhat but it turns out the ones you would use the most are the same color. The plastic does not seem all that sturdy for scooping flour and sugar and the handles are small and don't provide a firm grip. The size marker on the handle is very hard to read. Wish the size measurements were a different color than the measuring cup. As a frequent baker, I prefer stainless steel measuring cups.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a replacement for a comparable item that I had for over 20 years. This one hardly lasted three months! It is labeled as dishwasher safe and the first time I put it in the dishwasher it cracked. It was also awkward to use for a traditional right handed person. You had to turn the cup the opposite way you normally would to view the standard U.S. cup measuring marks. This is a low cost product, and low quality product. I would not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Can't use with boiling water
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I shouldn't have assumed you could use a measuring cup to store pasta water, but you can't use this one! I scooped the water out of my pasta pot and this little measuring cup cracked in about 8 places. It leaks now; I threw it away after less a month of use. :/ BUT a great little tool if you only plan to use it for cold liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Economical measuring cup
customer_reviews.text: I got this measuring cup on sale. I bought it because it has clear markings on the side. My daughter is learning to cook and the clear markings on this cup make it easier for her to measure liquids. However, it is made of cheap plastic and I don't think it will last long. I have glass measuring cups that I have had for 20 years but the markings are harder to read. So it really comes down to usability vs. durability.
customer_reviews.author: justthefacts

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a toy, since it has so many pieces
customer_reviews.text: My little girl kept stealing all the cooking stuff I use in the kitchen and wanted her own. This fit the bill. It is as sturdy or more sturdy as other toys that are comparable in price. Yes I know this is not actually a toy, but it sure works well enough and is the right price. Let's be honest, I would not need so many odd sizes for cooking and baking. She loves that though as there are more to play with. I am sure it would work for cooking as well. Sturdy enough for what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Fewell

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a complete set but...
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this set yesterday, and have only used one of the measuring cups ( 1/2 cup) and yes, they are thin and not sturdy. I filled the 1/2 cup measuring cup with oil this morning, and didnt have an issue. If you are scooping brown sugar or even regular sugar I'd not just hang onto the handle just in case but...the price is cheap for a complete set, so...you kind of get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Wascom

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. I have two sets because the handles broke off some of the cups on my first set. Just the other day I was getting a cup of flour and the handle broke off. I like them because of the many different sizes of the cups and spoons. I just wish they wouldn't break. I am not being too rough as I have rheumatoid arthritis and cannot give much strength to the process.
customer_reviews.author: Yolonde Delgreco

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really save space
customer_reviews.text: I love that they collapse, but they could use a better ring other than the plastic c-hook they come with. It would be nice if they clipped or snapped together when collapsed so they would stay together. They just sit, one on top the other. Honestly, it doesn't make sense because when they are all stacked they look the same size as the largest cup. So in reality, your standard measuring cups would be about the same size.
customer_reviews.author: BardyHar

customer_reviews.title: Handles break off
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets, one for me and one for my daughter. We liked that so many measurements came with the set. Some of the handles of both sets broke off. The measurement is also difficult to read. You cannot select the correct spoon or cup from the drawer. You must pick it up and get in the right light to see. I don't like giving a bad review but I am sorry that I purchased the sets. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Sizes Included
customer_reviews.text: Have only used one of these so far but overall is a good set for the money. I like that it includes more than just standard sizes, ex there's 1/32 tsp, a pinch, dash etc. I've often eyeballed trying to half a quarter tsp etc and this does the work for you. The rings make them easy to hang on hooks if you have that option. The different colors are nicer too than having all white.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Welch

customer_reviews.title: Good variety of sizes
customer_reviews.text: I like the different sizes in this set. The colors are bright and help with distinguishing the sizes. They are easy to clean and stack together well. My only concern would be how strong they are as far as handling heavier things like peanut butter. The handles might break if they are used to measure or scoop heavier foods but, otherwise, they are a very nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Rozalind Smith

customer_reviews.title: Weak rings
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of measurements available, BUT the ring holding them together comes apart with the slightest of movements while cooking. I was scooping a 1/2 cup of sugar and then ALL of the other cups exploded on to the floor. It happens with each set of them. I'm trying to find some sort of replacements for the rings... So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good Products !!! Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These are the best measuring cups ever! First of all, it is a very big set, and has so many different measurements! Aside from the classic, 1/2 cups, etc... it also has a big 2 cup and a small 1/8 cup! It is very useful to have so many measurements! For the spoons, it even has 1/16 teaspoon and 1/36 teaspoon! So awesome! It also has the measurement engraved into the cup so you will always know the measurement! I love these SOOO much and are very inexpensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri

customer_reviews.title: Weak handles, will snap over time
customer_reviews.text: Loved these colorful measuring cups when I first got them a year ago. However, after a year of sporadic usage, I found that the handle of my 1 Cup cup is about to snap off. That is a huge design flaw when it can't hold a cup of flour or water without bending and breaking. The spoon measures probably won't see this issue, but I feel like all the cup measures will face this lack of quality in the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Antsy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the hype.
customer_reviews.text: Just terrible. I can’t believe these get high ratings. The handles seem frail and like they’ll break and the measurements embossed on the handles are IMPOSSIBLE to read in most lighting. Cheap feeling plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G.

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: These measuring cups and spoons are great. They allow for odd measuring to be done like a 2 cup and 1 1/2 and 1 3/4 cup measuring cups and a 2 teaspoon measuring spoon. I love these but they could have darker writing on them. For my age it's hard to read. Otherwise I highly recommend these. For the price I'll wear my readers for these. There's such a variety.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good but be careful with dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, BUT I would be careful putting them in the dishwasher. I used my dishwasher settings "heavy" cycle with high temp & heat dry (I had some very sticky pots in the wash as well), and the 1/2 teaspoon melted and is now deformed (see pics). The tablespoon measurement, which was also in the same wash, was unchanged.
customer_reviews.author: Ariella

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap set
customer_reviews.text: Well they are measuring cups and spoons for sure - what else can you say? BUT, to get such a complete set like this for less than $8 is an absolute steal. Even if you have some measuring cups and spoons, get this set as a backup. They are pretty sturdy but maybe not as solid as some more expensive sets. But they will get the job done. Love all the different sizes provided in both the cups and spoons. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: CW1977

customer_reviews.title: Love this set.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this set for almost 5 years. Love that there are so many different sizes of both cups and spoons, very handy. The set has given me great service and have held up well. Now after 5 years a couple of the handles have broken, I feel the service this set has given me is well worth the money and I will replace with the same set.
customer_reviews.author: Karla O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: So my sister bought these for herself and at first I didn't like them because of the color and amount of pieces but the range in sizes is amazing and makes cooking easier. No more counting 1/2 cups and trying to half 1/4 tsp's. So now I've bought my own for my house and I still love them.
customer_reviews.author: jayswife526

customer_reviews.title: Nice measuring tools
customer_reviews.text: These are great, they clean easily, and are of good quality. I bought these for my boyfriend because he was lacking in kitchen tools and they were just what he needed. Only knock on them is that its really easy for some of the cups/spoons to unattach from the little ring that holds them together. That's good if you want to take one off individually, but if you want them to all stay together and not separate on their own when moving stuff around in a drawer you'll be out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Cait M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in the quality of this product. Got those as a Christmas present & was happy because there are so many sizes. However only 9 months later the handle of the largest cup has broken. Considering the hefty price that is a very poor performance. Would not recommend these to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Iris G. Kowalewski

customer_reviews.title: I love these measuring cups and spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love these measuring cups and spoons. Right now my family consists of two people. That means that most recipes have to halved so that I don't make two much. However, sometimes I would halve 1/4 and have to guess how much 1/8 is. Now I don't have to guess. These measuring utensils have a great range that is very useful. Spoon measurements include: smidgeon (1/32 tsp), pinch (1/16 tsp), dash (1/8 tsp),1/4 tsp, 1/2 tsp, 1 tsp, 1/2 tbs, 2 tsp, and 1 tbs. Cup measurements include: 1/8 cup, 1/4 cup, 1/3 cup, 1/2 cup, 2/3 cup, 3/4 cup, 1 cup, 1 1/2 cup, 1 3/4 cup, 2 cup
customer_reviews.author: TCHR

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to read
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that there are so many sizes, that’s very useful, but the measurements that are stamped into the handles are extremely hard to read, I have to hold them up to the light and angle them to read them. They should have been colored or stamped better so we can see them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Schildt

customer_reviews.title: I love this sifter!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sifter. It’s easy to use and clean. I bought it to sift gluten free nut flours and cocoa powder. I’m thrilled with its performance for both of these purposes! I especially like the “no mess” feature of having a collection container under the sifter. It stores away nice and neat too.
customer_reviews.author: Grace K. Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. They stay stationary while I'm pouring things into them without me having to hold onto them, so my hands are free because of their wide flat bottoms. I accidentally melted my last ones. Got something nasty on them and decided to sterilize them with boiling water. Bad idea. Lesson learned. They shrink and melt if you do that, so don't! I'd keep them out of the microwave too. Besides, you're never supposed to cook things in plastic in the microwave because it releases toxins from the plastic into the food.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Really Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Really like it, just can’t be sure yet if are dish washer safe or not? And the ring they come with are very light won’t hold the cups id you want to hang them somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handles break off after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: These might be a great idea in theory if, for example you don't want to scratch non-stick surfaces. Problem is, they are not that sturdy. The handles bend and crack after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: The Most Complete Set of Measuring Cups and Spoons Ever
customer_reviews.text: These are perfectly good measuring cups and there are more cups than I've ever used, and will probably ever use, in life. I do appreciate the additional measuring spoons, however, since I often reduce recipes in size and it's difficult to do with such small measurements. They are all made of sturdy plastic and can go right in the dishwasher. My only very small, infinitesimal complaint is that the little nub on the little ring that is meant to hold the cups together is a little shallow so the ring doesn't snap together securely and it's cups everywhere. This is a small thing, the cups and the spoons work perfectly well.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: The Only Measuring Cups and Spoons you Will Ever Need
customer_reviews.text: Bought one set for me, one for my daughter and two for my sister. at recent family dinner, my granddaughter saw them and wanted a set. So I ordered her a set. We love them. They are very easy to use and have any size you need. Also with the added pinch, smidgen etc. they make a great conversation among avid cooks.
customer_reviews.author: Charline Greer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect measuring cups and engraved measurements
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. There is a wide arrange of sizes that are commonly used. They wash well I the dishwasher and none have broken on me so far. I bought these because they were a great price and because they have the measurements engraved on them instead of printed on them. They are great," and I would recommend them again.
customer_reviews.author: JennaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: This combination has hard to find small measure cups and spoons...altogether with typical sizes. Easy to clean and hold. Bright colors...very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: P. nesser

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste you cash
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for a while. Now they are going to the thrift store. They lose their shape in the dishwasher. So unless you want to wash them by hand with every use, don't get these. I love the multitude of sizes but they just aren't convenient.
customer_reviews.author: bonbon

customer_reviews.title: I like these a lot!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great because they come with different sizes that are very handy. No, I wouldn’t use them as a “scoop” as I’ve read in some other posts - they’re not meant for scooping, hence the name “measuring” cups. I also love the added measuring spoons - again with different very handy sizes. They store easily and when used properly will make baking less of a chore!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikkiefinn

customer_reviews.title: Great asset when baking!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of these measuring cups and spoons, one for a friend and one for my home. Both my friend and I agree they are wonderful! The various sizes of cups and spoons are so helpful and make the baking process go quicker than usual. For example, when a recipe calls for 2 cups of flour, the cup which holds 2 cups is awesome to have. We are very pleased to have them!
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I now have every size of measuring cup that I could possibly need and for a reasonable price. It is a little hard to read what size it is on the handles but for the price, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: SMarley

customer_reviews.title: A bit faulty, but worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Value for price is definitely good with the item. It's way better than purchasing 5 pc set from Safeway for 10.99. But it is plastic, and can easily bend out of shape. I also find the connector to be faulty. But overall, this is a good cheap buy.
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: My favorite set of measuring cups and spoons
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best set of measuring cups and spoons that I have ever owned. I have gone through quite a few in the past. What I love about these is that there are so many different sizes so you can get the exact measurement in one cup instead of having to use several cups if you had a set with less cups. I have had them for a while now and have had no problems with the durability of them- and I wash them in the dishwasher. Highly recommend. I love giving these away for bridal shower gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one because my first one was cracked by a cabinet door. I am old fashioned and still always sift my flour. This makes it so easy, no trying to balance the measuring cup underneath because it is always there and screwed on securely. I got two for Christmas as gifts because my other one was cracked. I gave one to my grandson's girlfriend so she can start out her measuring easily.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Tilford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I use these virtually daily while whipping up a dinner fit for a king! High quality, thick, sturdy, and easy to clean. 19 cups and spoons allow you measure the precise amount of substance for your recipes. You can disassemble the measuring gizmos from their hooking devices, which come apart easily. They are dishwasher safe in the upper rack, but they're easy to clean by hand, so the full set is available for the next recipe. Buy two sets and give one to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Schiel

customer_reviews.title: You get a lot for what you paid for!
customer_reviews.text: I like how theres just a lot of different sizes with these measuring cups and spoons. I'm a little worried about the durability of these because of some of the reviews, but for now they just seem like really great cups for the price! Will update if I feel like it broke a little too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Make cooking efficient!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great product and I’ve had them for a year or two now and they have held up great. I do recommend if looking for a cost effective set for anyone starting out they are great. I wish they could have been metal but for their price I can’t complAin
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. I had the same set for nearly 10 years, but my toddler managed to lose some of the measuring cups, so I was so happy to find it on amazon! I love the many sizes, and use the larger ones constantly when baking. The 2-cup is great!! The hold up perfectly, and stack up nice - they don't take up a lot of room at all. And bonus - dishwasher safe :) *I've seen reviews about these breaking - I've never had one break, and both of my children play with them all the time
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Can ready easily. On the light side and fair price for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: You could read the lines easily. My 3 older ones you could barely read the lines anymore. It has to be determined about it. I did think the product was on the light side. It did come really fast. The price was fair for what it was.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hauptfleisch

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't baked in years, and so my handful of this and a pinch of that doesn't work for baked goods! But these are so detailed that there are actually 3 spoons called, "Smidgen, Pinch & Dash"...such a cute surprise! I'm gonna make me some yummy keto bread tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: VJErwood

customer_reviews.title: So many measurements.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, easy to measure with so many sizes. Need 2 cups, only need one for that instead of measuring twice. Also nice to measure small amounts and then pour into larger one when several ingredients needed. They stack nicely, don't take up much space. They seem really sturdy even though they are plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Bk70

customer_reviews.title: every size I need!
customer_reviews.text: This set is exactly what I needed. I used to have two sets of measuring cups and two sets of measuring spoons (which didn't nest together, so they took up more room), and I STILL didn't have every size I needed. This set includes everything you could want...even a 2-cup measuring cup (which is often the amount of flour in a recipe) and a 3/4-cup measuring cup, which most sets don't have. The colors and bold and pretty, and the material isn't flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: luv2sing

customer_reviews.title: I guess you shouldn't microwave
customer_reviews.text: I microwaved butter for 45 seconds and it cracked, it's still usable though with no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Lowe

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best measuring cups ever! First of all, it is a very big set, and has so many different measurements! Aside from the classic, 1/2 cups, etc... it also has a big 2 cup and a small 1/8 cup! It is very useful to have so many measurements! For the spoons, it even has 1/16 teaspoon and 1/36 teaspoon! So awesome! It also has the measurement engraved into the cup so you will always know the measurement! I love these SOOO much and are very inexpensive for what you get. 1 year later: I still have them and they are still awesome! None of them have broken!
customer_reviews.author: Z.A.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love these measuring cups and spoons. Well worth the money. They seem to be very sturdy and they are easy to clean. I'd buy them again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Bulky.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the odd sizes and they are good for that. However, I personally do not like the look of them so I had to find a place out of view for them. To me, they are bulky and cheap looking. I have no problem displaying my stainless steel measuring cups and spoons out in the open making them easily accessible, but these go behind closed doors, sorry. Kind of wish I had spent the extra money for more stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Southern GalTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This product is great for measuring
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for measuring. It is well rounded and sturdy which makes it great for Scooping your Product for Measuring. The Only reason I am not giving it a 5 star its because the Numbering is difficult to see although it is embedded or stamped on the measuring cup handle. If it was embedded but with a different color than the cup itself then I think this measuring cup would be Perfect. all in all it is the best Measuring Cup I have at the Moment.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: This Cup is Plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I searched by material type: GLASS. This Cup Is Plastic I read the entire description and it says nowhere that it is plastic. False Advertising being listed under a search for "Glass Measuring Cup".
customer_reviews.author: NWLokstars

customer_reviews.title: Wanted and searched for a glass measuring device too bad for me
customer_reviews.text: So not only not glass, had two stickers on it that did not want to peel off and I had to use the WD 40 trick. One was under the handle, smooth move there. I advise against buying this, go for the Pyrex, wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Mark O.

customer_reviews.title: Never Seen So many sizes
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing. There are more sizes of measuring cups and spoons then I have ever seen. The only complaint is that the ring they are on doesn't stay closed and seems very cheap. There is even a dash a pinch and and a smidgen! Any size you will need in a dry measuring cup is here!
customer_reviews.author: Msavvy

customer_reviews.title: love the 2/3 and 3/4 cups
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are sturdy, have flat bottoms and best of all, they come with a 2/3 and 3/4 cup, unlike most measuring cups. Ordered another set for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: J. Teague

customer_reviews.title: Overdue for Measuring Cups
customer_reviews.text: After so many years of using the same measuring cups (with many sizes now missing), it was time to get new sets. This has some sizes the usual measuring cups do not have. I'm loving it! I did have to divide the various sizes for storage and to make it easier to grab the correct size measuring cups that I need. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: JCF

customer_reviews.title: Great for any cook or baker who needs the full set!
customer_reviews.text: Love these measuring cups as its all the ones you need for recipes. Love hat the cups can all be separated as that’s how I prefer it. My roommates didn’t know not to put these on the bottom shelf when washing them. So in case anyone else doesn’t know, the heat on the bottom shelf can melt anything plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Love the way this allows you to sift flour while ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this allows you to sift flour while also measuring it! One less step in my baking routine. Update July 2020: I bought this in September 2016 and have loved it. I always hand wash it and yesterday while washing it, the top clear plastic came unglued from the red threaded part. I'm impressed it lasted this long. I might be able to super glue it back but I may have to buy again if I can't fix it because I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: AMP78

customer_reviews.title: Ok, you get want you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this measuring cup because it’s very good price, But the page didn’t say anything about the material it is made of, in the picture it looks like it might be made of glass, but turns out it is plastic and it looks like it is really not sturdy. The description doesn’t specify what it is, also there are no questions to the seller as to what it is made of.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W.

customer_reviews.title: great for instant pot cooking or regular cooking that requires a lot of measurements
customer_reviews.text: love these they are so easy to clean up and measure everything just perfectly. Great for instant pot cooking that requires a lot of measurements or even regular recipes that require a lot of different measurements. Even has a pinch and a dash for all you old southern women lol.
customer_reviews.author: smeltn

customer_reviews.title: need thicker handles
customer_reviews.text: The handles are a little fragile. My adult son used the tablespoon to scoop out butter out of a tub he was measuring and the handle broke off. Also one of the measuring cup handles broke off as well. The colors are bright and they clean up easily.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: MADE WELL AND STORE WELL
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our new RV. So many things I wanted to bring but yet room is at a premium. So, anything collapsable is your best bet. These fit in a drawer, take up little space, clean easy and made well and do not break. For all those reasons, I am glad I purchased these measuring cups.
customer_reviews.author: shopinful

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, long-lasting, and multiple size options - Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves these. Her sight is not as good as it used to be so we use a sharpie to write the measurement on the handle. When the sharpie wears off, we can rewrite it because the measurements have raised lettering instead of being printed. If you have difficulty reading raised lettering (same color as cup) and don't want to write on them, then these may not be for you. The hoops that hold these attached are easy to remove; I have attached measuring spoons up to 1 teaspoon on one loop and the larger ones on another loop.
customer_reviews.author: Farm Girl in the City

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a few months and was happy with it. Easy to read, dishwasher safe. Yesterday I took it out of a room temperature drawer and put some milk from the fridge in it. I heard a weird crinkling noise but had no idea it was the measuring cup. I don't know why it did this and I don't think it should have as I didn't do anything wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Froehlich

customer_reviews.title: Great cups
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I was sick of getting the measuring cups with the painted on measurements that would wash off - these are melted or engraved on so they won’t ever come off. They’ve been put through the dishwasher several dozen times and held up well
customer_reviews.author: Blakay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I needed to start measuring my portions and I needed to expand my previous set. This set includes so much for the price. I have put mine in the dishwasher no issues. Great product, great price
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Honestly thought it was glass so I was a little upset to find out it was plastic, but its huge so I kept it and know I will use it.
customer_reviews.author: aulrich

customer_reviews.title: I love the color of these nice measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: I think Im really going to like these colapsible measuring cups. They wash by hand nicely and are also dishwasher safe. I have had a major change in my kitchen and needed space saving and they will do the trick. Thanks to Amazon I received them in just 1 day.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I use them almost every day.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read and clean, simple but cute design, hold up great in the dishwasher. The best thing about this set is the unusual sizes (3/4 cup, 2/3 cup, 2 cups, 2 tsp, 1/16 tsp, etc)! No more combining multiple measuring cups or eyeballing small amounts! This is especially helpful if you're cooking for yourself and end up splitting recipes in halves or even quarters. These are a must-have for people who cook and bake frequently!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Passover and now I want to purchase another set for year round because I love them! They have so many sizes and are great quality. I especially like how the sizes are molded in the plastic and can’t wash off
customer_reviews.author: Mordy K

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set like this but didn’t want to spend so much money on them. I recently started tracking my calories and this is exactly what I needed. It arrived quickly and in perfect condition. I’ve only wash them by hand so I’m not sure how they do on the dishwasher. They seem very durable and for $9 definitely worth it!! See pics
customer_reviews.author: Alessandromvsp

customer_reviews.title: Good measuring cup
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a professional grade but perfectly fine for first time chef like my 12 yo daughter. I probably wouldn't use dishwasher for clean up though it says dishwasher safe. Still good value and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: My mistake... didn't read carefully
customer_reviews.text: oops. i wanted a 1 cup measuring cup that I could throw in my kitchen drawer.. I have to feedback because I will not be using these. I have never needed a 2-cup measuring cup in 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: I like to cook and these things are great because they ...
customer_reviews.text: I like to cook and these things are great because they have all the in between sizes that just makes sense. Unforseen use...the little guy at home played with them for an hour putting them in order on the rings. Forget toys just buy kitchen stuff that kids can play with and I can use to make cookies and delicious food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great measuring cups with rings
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I love that it has all the measuring I need and that they come in rings to hold together. They are very good quality. Has measurements on the handle and very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have almost all the sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars but had 2 pinch’s and no smidgen.
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of sizes for a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are really great. Bright blues and Reds. I thought they were a great value because they have sooo many different measurement sizes. I tossed out all my old measuring cups. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: 2 cup measuring cup!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking for a set that had a 2 cup measuring cup - this one has it, and SO MANY MORE!!! Including a 2/3 c measure, a 3/4 c measure... They hold up well, and there are SO MANY of them - in sizes I've never seen before!
customer_reviews.author: Rleeb77

customer_reviews.title: 3rd time buying this set - I always come back to it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of measuring cups, as it ranges from extremely small to extremely large sizes. I love that the colors change as you go through the sizes. I have purchased this set 3 times now (over 10 years!), as I lose items or they slowly break. I have them hanging on the door of my cupboard with little clips and a custom made "sticker sign" from Etsy that labels each size - makes it so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Katie H

customer_reviews.title: Keep the stickers off the front on cup
customer_reviews.text: They put 2 stickers on the cup that I cannot pull off. I’m going to have to soak and scrub the cup to remove the stickers. They need to use better stickers or none at all because that is inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Walton

customer_reviews.title: SPACE SAVER !!!🤗
customer_reviews.text: Love that they take up little space.. Work well "my granddaughter loved mine so I ordered her a set ❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: 🌺🌿Amazon  shopper🌿🌺

customer_reviews.title: Replaces all sets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. Bless her heart, she's always scrambling through a drawer of misfits to measure with. This has the smaller cups joined together on a ring & the larger cups on their own ring. Spoons are great. Set is embossed with amount vs painted on. Would have given it a 5 but I had to spend $5.99 on binder o-rings since plastic loops to join sets were flimsy. Set is still great. Every bride would love these.
customer_reviews.author: FibroWarrior

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Handles are super flimsy. Cannot hold handle and scoop with the largest cups. Handles will bend and snap due to the resistance. One nearly broke while scooping sugar, I luckily noticed and stopped pushing before it snap, just spilled everywhere instead.
customer_reviews.author: SP

product_meta.title: Prepworks by Progressive Measuring Flour Sifter
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Piece| Style Name:Flour Sifter

Prepworks by Progressive highly efficent 3-Cup capacity Rotary Flour Sifter measures sifted and unsifted flour. Sifted flour is contained in removable measuring cup to prevent countertop messes. The measuring cup nest for compact storage and the fine mesh screen allows for dusting of flour or powdered sugar. It has a non-skid base and is dishwasher safe.

For over 40 years, our mission has been to create innovative kitchen tools and gadgets that make food preparation fun and fast while inspiring culinary creativity. From our thinstore™ collapsibles to our sophisticated PL8™ line, our dedication to providing quality products supported by superior customer service continues to drive our creative development today.

At Progressive International, we continually strive to understand the needs of today’s cooks. Our team includes talented, energetic and passionate people committed to reimagining the kitchen. We strive to pass our passion on to our consumers through our thoughtfully designed tools, layered with our avid desire to go beyond the expected.

Our philosophy is simple: offer stylish designs complimented by no-nonsense functionality. We understand the kitchen is the heart of the home, where families and friends connect. Our ongoing mission is to provide exceptional kitchen essentials that help cooks of all skill levels create meals worth sharing.

Prep Solutions;, Prepworks and PL8 continues to build on the Progressive; legacy by offering products that make food prep faster, easier and more enjoyable.
feature_bullets: Measures both sifted and unsifted flour
Sifted flour contained in a measuring cup
Nests for compact storage; non-skid base
Safe to use in the dishwasher
